vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.pulsealgorithm

类 EspptwccViaPulse

  • java.lang.Object
    • vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.AbstractPriceProblem
      • vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.pulsealgorithm.EspptwccViaPulse

  • public class EspptwccViaPulse
extends AbstractPriceProblem
    Solve a SPPTWCC via Pulse Algorithm,
    see Leonardo Lozano, et al. (2015):
    An Exact Algorithm for the Elementary Shortest Path Problem with Resource Constraints,
    The code is based on https://github.com/dengfaheng/CGVRPTW/tree/master/CGVRPTW_DFH
    从以下版本开始:
    JDK1.8
    版本:
    V1.0
    作者:
    Xiong Wangqi

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private class  EspptwccViaPulse.PulseTask
      Thread for pulse stage.
      private class  EspptwccViaPulse.PulseVertex
      Pulse Vertex class for pulse algorithm.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> allFinalShortestPaths
      存储所有的到达了 end depot 且 revised cost 最小的 path.
      private double initialTimeConsumption
      every node have an initial time consumption in each iteration of bound scheme.
      private int maxTimeIndex
      max time index to store the bound matrix.
      private double naiveBound
      minimum of cost/time ratio among all arcs.
      private EspptwccViaPulse.PulseVertex[] pulseVertexes
      用于记录 Pulse Algorithm 中各个节点的信息.
      private double relaxationBound
      lowest bound found in bound scheme without considering initial demand at start node.
      private int threadNum 
      private java.lang.Thread[] threads
      threads for pulse.
      private double timeLimitLb
      time limit lower bound in bound scheme.
      private double timeStep
      time step in bound scheme.

      • 从类继承的字段 vrptw.algorithm.subproblem.AbstractPriceProblem

        capacity, revisedCostMatrix, revisedCostOfShortestPath, shortestPaths, timeMatrix, vertexNum, vrptwIns

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      private void boundingScheme()
      Calculate bounds store the minimum revised cost that can be achieved, by any partial path P that reaches node v[i] with a given amount of consumed resource.

      Calculate a lower bound given a time consumption at a given node in bound scheme.
      private double calBoundPhase2(int currVertexId, double time)
      Calculate a lower bound given a time consumption at a given node in pulse.
      private void calNaiveBound()
      set naiveBound to be minimum of cost/time ratio among all arcs.

      Pulse stage.

      Pulse for bound scheme.
      protected void reset()
      重置相关变量，准备下一次求解.
      private boolean rollBack(int currVertexId, double cost, double time, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath)
      Roll back pruning strategy.
      void solve(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> lambda)
      Solve an ESPPTWCC via pulse algorithm:
      Step 0: Initialization
      Step 1: bounding Scheme
      Step 2: Pulse from start depot
      Step 4: Filtering.
      private void tryToUpdateRelaxationBound(double cost, double demand, double time, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath, int rootVertexId)
      boundingScheme() 阶段找到了到达 end depot 的路径，尝试更新 AbstractPriceProblem.revisedCostOfShortestPath.

      update VRPTW instance after branch on time window.

    • 方法详细资料

      • updateVrptwIns

        public void updateVrptwIns(Vrptw vrptwInsTwChanged)
        从类复制的说明: AbstractPriceProblem
        update VRPTW instance after branch on time window.
        指定者:
        updateVrptwIns 在类中 AbstractPriceProblem
        参数:
        vrptwInsTwChanged - new VRPTW instance

      • solve

        public void solve(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> lambda)
        Solve an ESPPTWCC via pulse algorithm:
        Step 0: Initialization
        Step 1: bounding Scheme
        Step 2: Pulse from start depot
        Step 4: Filtering.
        指定者:
        solve 在类中 AbstractPriceProblem
        参数:
        lambda - dual values

      • reset

        protected void reset()
        从类复制的说明: AbstractPriceProblem
        重置相关变量，准备下一次求解.
        指定者:
        reset 在类中 AbstractPriceProblem

      • boundingScheme

        private void boundingScheme()
        Calculate bounds store the minimum revised cost that can be achieved, by any partial path P that reaches node v[i] with a given amount of consumed resource.

      • pulseInBound

        private void pulseInBound(int currVertexId,
                          double cost,
                          double demand,
                          double time,
                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath,
                          int rootVertexId)
        Pulse for bound scheme.
        参数:
        currVertexId - 当前节点 ID
        cost - 到达当前节点的 revised Cost
        demand - 到达当前节点时已服务的需求量
        time - 到达当前节点的时间
        partialPath - 路径上的节点（不包含 rootVertexId）
        rootVertexId - 路径的出发节点

      • pulse

        private void pulse(int threadId,
                   int currVertexId,
                   double cost,
                   double demand,
                   double time,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath)
        Pulse stage.
        参数:
        threadId - 线程 ID
        currVertexId - 当前节点 ID
        cost - 到达当前节点的 revised cost
        demand - 到达当前节点时已服务的需求量
        time - 到达当前节点的时间
        partialPath - partialPath 路径上的节点（不包含 rootVertexId）

      • calNaiveBound

        private void calNaiveBound()
        set naiveBound to be minimum of cost/time ratio among all arcs.

      • rollBack

        private boolean rollBack(int currVertexId,
                         double cost,
                         double time,
                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath)
        Roll back pruning strategy.
        参数:
        currVertexId - 当前节点
        cost - 到达当前节点的 revised cost
        time - 到达当前节点的时间
        partialPath - 给定路径（不包含 currVertexId）
        返回:
        是否“剪枝”

      • calBoundPhase1

        private double calBoundPhase1(int currVertexId,
                              double time,
                              int rootVertexId)
        Calculate a lower bound given a time consumption at a given node in bound scheme.
        参数:
        currVertexId - 当前所在节点
        time - 到达当前节点的时间
        rootVertexId - 路径的出发节点
        返回:
        bound of currVertex，即 rootVertex 之后的路径的理想成本

      • tryToUpdateRelaxationBound

        private void tryToUpdateRelaxationBound(double cost,
                                        double demand,
                                        double time,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath,
                                        int rootVertexId)
        boundingScheme() 阶段找到了到达 end depot 的路径，尝试更新 AbstractPriceProblem.revisedCostOfShortestPath.
        参数:
        cost - 到达 end depot 的 revised Cost
        demand - 到达 end depot 时已服务的需求量
        time - 到达 end depot 的时间
        partialPath - 路径上的节点（不包含 rootVertexId）
        rootVertexId - 路径的出发节点

      • calBoundPhase2

        private double calBoundPhase2(int currVertexId,
                              double time)
        Calculate a lower bound given a time consumption at a given node in pulse.
        参数:
        currVertexId - 当前所在节点
        time - 到达当前节点的时间
        返回:
        当前节点的 bound，即当前节点之后的的剩余路径的理想成本

      • tryToUpdateShortestPath

        private void tryToUpdateShortestPath(int threadId,
                                     double cost,
                                     double demand,
                                     double time,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> partialPath)
        pulse(int, int, double, double, double, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>) 阶段找到了到达 end depot 的路径，尝试更新最短路径.
        参数:
        threadId - 线程 ID
        cost - 到达 end depot 的 revised cost
        demand - 到达 end depot 时已经服务的需求量
        time - 到达 end depot 的时间
        partialPath - 路径上的节点（不包含 end depot ID）
